events.message: The applicant has submitted the loan application requesting funds for medical expenses related to a recent surgery.
The loan request was categorized under Personal Loan due to the nature of the expenses involving medical bills.
A loan officer has been assigned to handle the applicant's personal loan case and will initiate further processing.
The loan officer reviewed the application details, confirming the requested amount and checking initial eligibility criteria.
Additional documents were requested from the applicant, including medical bills, identity proof, and income statements.
The applicant has uploaded all requested documents, including hospital invoices and recent pay stubs, for verification.
The credit check was completed, showing a stable credit score and no recent delinquencies in the applicant's financial history.
Risk assessment was conducted, determining the loan to be within acceptable risk parameters based on credit and documentation.
A personalized loan offer was presented, including detailed terms, interest rates, and repayment schedule suitable to the applicant.
The applicant responded positively to the loan offer, requesting clarification on the early repayment penalties.
Due to applicant's query, the application was escalated to the senior loan officer for further review and final decision.
The loan was approved by the senior officer after clarifying all terms, confirming applicant eligibility and documentation.
The approved loan amount was successfully disbursed to the applicant's bank account with confirmation sent via email.
A follow-up call was made to ensure that the applicant has received the funds and to offer assistance with repayment monitoring.
The application process was formally closed after successful funding and follow-up, with no pending issues reported.
